original_text: God's great power did not come from anyone else! He himself has authority over the whole world. God's great power did not come from anyone else! He himself has authority over the whole world. God's great power did not come from anyone else! He himself has authority over the whole world. God's great power did not come from anyone else!
korean_text: 누가 땅을 그에게 맡겼느냐 누가 온 세상을 그에게 맡겼느냐

sentences.original_text: God's great power did not come from anyone else
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님의 위대한 권능은 다른 사람에게서 온 것이 아닙니다

sentences.original_text: He himself has authority over the whole world
sentences.korean_translation: 그분 자신이 온 세상에 대한 권위를 가지고 계십니다
